name: The Secret Life of Probes Prologue
name_original: The Secret Life of Probes Prologue
description:
This is the prologue for an interactive branching narrative game taking place in the far reaches of space and time.

Converse with the unlikely inhabitants of our galaxy. Use tools, applications, and learned information to discover your place in the cosmos.

You made it.

At least, if you can read this, you made it.

We've been waiting for you. I bet you have questions.

I'm sorry, but I won't be able to answer your questions, not yet.

These messages have taken roughly a day to reach you.

It will take your messages a day to reach me, as well.

Don't bother.

Sound on.

10-20 minutes to play through.

Enjoy~

Music:

Lightless Dawn by Kevin MacLeod
Link: https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/song/3982-lightless-dawn
